tests.name: 03. Basic Commands (8 tests)
tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 8 {print "PASS"}'

tests.name: 04. REPEAT Structures (5 tests)
tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 13 {print "PASS"}'

tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 22 {print "PASS"}'

tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 25 {print "PASS"}'

tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 46 {print "PASS"}'

tests.name: 10. Comments (5 tests)
tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep -E 'Tests run: [0-9]+' | head -1 | sed 's/.*Tests run: \([0-9]*\).*/\1/' | awk '$1 >= 51 {print "PASS"}'

tests.name: 11. Invalid Syntax Errors (48 tests)
tests.run: mvn test -Dtest=RoboLangReflectionTest 2>&1 | grep 'Tests run: 99, Failures: 0, Errors: 0' && echo 'PASS'
